mapper.insert: insert into member ( member_id, member_pwd, member_gender, member_phone, member_email, member_nickname, member_birth, member_status, is_admin, member_createdate ) values ( #{memberId}, #{memberPwd}, #{memberGender}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberBirth}, 'Y', #{memberIsAdmin}, sysdate )
mapper.select: select friend_member_no from friend where member_no = #{memberNo} and friend_status='A' union select member_no from friend where friend_member_no = #{memberNo} and friend_status='A'

mapper.delete: delete from friend where (member_no = #{myMemberNo} and friend_member_no = #{friendMemberNo}) or (member_no = #{friendMemberNo} and friend_member_no = #{myMemberNo})
mapper.update: update friend set friend_status='A' where ((member_no = #{myMemberNo} and friend_member_no = #{friendMemberNo}) or (member_no = #{friendMemberNo} and friend_member_no = #{myMemberNo})) and friend_status='W'
mapper.select: select * from (select * from member where member_id like '%${search}%' or member_nickname like '%${search}%') where member_no not in ( select friend_member_no from friend where member_no = #{myMemberNo} union select member_no from friend where friend_member_no = #{myMemberNo} ) and member_no not in( select member_no from block where b_member_no = #{myMemberNo} union select b_member_no from block where member_no =#{myMemberNo} ) and member_no != #{myMemberNo}
select * from friend where (member_no = #{myMemberNo} and friend_member_no = #{friendMemberNo}) or (member_no = #{friendMemberNo} and friend_member_no = #{myMemberNo})
